title: Anshan, Liaouing, China
marks: Signature, title, date, inscription on back, in pencil: [Anshan, Liaouing, China Sep 1
description: man, lower right foreground, pulling on a rod attached (?) to large vertical pipe; hand wagon with three wheels and broom, lower left foreground; building in background; rails leading to building; horizontal walkway and large tube above
creditline: Gift of David L. and Mary M.D. Parker
